front.title: Applicability Statement for Provider Provisioned CE-based Virtual Private Networks

abstract.t: This document is an applicability statement for Provider Provisioned CE-based IPsec VPNs, as discribed in [CEVPN]. This document describes how provider provisioned CE-based approaches meet the key requirements that are outlined in the PPVPN Applicability Statements Guideline document [ASGUIDE].
